name: Master Commander: Only One Enemy Matters
name_original: Master Commander: Only One Enemy Matters
description:
The Androids have invaded! Rescue the Citizens left by dropping them off in the Safe Zone! Unfortunately, the Androids are not able to be destroyed, unless you kill the one controlling them all, the Master Commander!

*This was made in 3 hours and 20 minutes for Trijam 125, my second Gamejam ever.*

How To Play:

- Maneuver the Camera around the world with WASD or Arrow Keys
- Click and Drag Civilians using the mouse, and let go to drop them.
- Take Civilians to the Safe Zone, follow the Arrow at the top of the screen.
- Find and Eliminate the Master Commander by clicking on it. Marked by a Red Antenna and a Pinkish marker on the Mini Map.
- Esc to Pause
- Level will end when the Enemy is Eliminated and there are No more remaining Civilians.

----------------

This game only has 2 levels due to time constraints. Hope you enjoy, and please do leave any and all feedback! Hope you enjoy! 

This is also the first time I have attempted making my own sprites. Input very much appreciated.
